Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The people have spoken and they are calling for change. We need to address the growing epidemic of cancer particularly among First Nations People. Additionally we need to increase JobSeeker Welfare and related payments as people are struggling to put food on the table. The Budget must strike a balance between these needs whilst not contributing to inflation. With the Liberal party inheriting a massive debt they need to show greater accountability and transparency in their decision making to see the country prosper.
